pages.text: As it has been noted previously, rocks are incredibly sensitive creatures.$(br2)All it takes is something soft and warm and they will immediately begin cozying up to their owners.$(br2)Rocks may have a hard exterior, but they are always willing to show their affection, even when not being held.
Due to their resilient and unmoving nature, rocks have been found to be excellent lifetime companions to those suffering emotional trauma.
